ca.corefacility.gview.managers

Class ResolutionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.managers.ResolutionManager

  • public class ResolutionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the calculation of when to switch resolutions based upon the current scale. A resolution switch is a point at which more detail should be drawn on the map, such as increasing the tick marks on the ruler etc.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ResolutionManager.Direction

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResolutionManager(double initialScale, double minZoom)
      Creates a new Resolution Switcher object with the default value of 2 for scale switch.
      ResolutionManager(double initialScale, double switchScale, double minScale)
      Creates a new Resolution switcher object which is used to control when to switch resolutions.

        Creates a new Resolution Switcher object with the default value of 2 for scale switch.

      • ResolutionManager

        public ResolutionManager(double initialScale,
                 double switchScale,
                 double minScale)
        Creates a new Resolution switcher object which is used to control when to switch resolutions.
        Parameters:
        initialScale - The initial scale of the map.
        switchScale - The scale switch value to use.

    • Method Detail

      • getSwitchScale

        public double getSwitchScale()
        The Scale switch value defines the value which is multiplied by the previous zoom level we switched at to get the next zoom level to switch. So, if we previously switched resolutions at zoom=10, and if scale switch = 2, then the next zoom level we will switch resolutions is at zoom = 20.
        Returns:
        Returns the scale switch value.

      • getResolutionLevel

        public int getResolutionLevel(double scale)
        Determines the particular resolution level that the passed scale would lie within.
        Parameters:
        scale -
        Returns:
        The resolution scale (an int >= 0).

        public int getCurrentResolutionLevel()

      • performSwitch

        public void performSwitch(double scale)
        Performs the resolution switch, given the current scale.
        Parameters:
        scale - The current scale of the map.

      • isNewResolutionLevel

        public boolean isNewResolutionLevel(double scale)
        Determines if the passed scale would cause a switch to a new resolution.
        Parameters:
        scale -
        Returns:
        True if it would cause a switch to a new resolution, false otherwise.

      • getMaxResolutionLevels

        public int getMaxResolutionLevels(double maxScale)
        Gets the maximum number of resolution levels.
        Parameters:
        maxScale - The maximum scale for the map.
        Returns:
        The maximum number of resolution levels for the passed scale.

      • isMinResolutionLevel

        public boolean isMinResolutionLevel(double zoom)
        Determines if the passed zoom value is at the minimum resolution level.
        Parameters:
        zoom - The zoom value to check.
        Returns:
        True if the passed zoom value is at the minimum resolution level, false otherwise.
